newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Swire, SHK Prop to redevelop site.
newsitem.headline: Swire, SHK Prop to redevelop site.

text.p: Swire Pacific Ltd said on Wednesday its Swire Properties Ltd and Sun Hung Kai Properties Ltd's New Town (N.T.) Properties Ltd had acquired the right to redevelop the Shui Wing steel mill site in Hong Kong.
